title: Disney’s Housing Venture, Truth Social’s Soft Launch, and Scott’s Voicemails
description:
Kara and Scott discuss Truth Social’s future, Elon Musk’s beef with the SEC, and Disney’s new housing venture. Plus,
Kara hired a plane to fly Scott’s phone number on a banner over South Beach. We play the voicemails.
Send us your Listener Mail questions by calling us at 855-51-PIVOT, or via Yappa, at nymag.com/pivot.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
